TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeIdentifiers extends System.Object

summary.span: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.

span.span: Maintains a group of names for related code entities or type mappings that are generated by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下列表标识工具和类使用:The following list identifies tools and classes that use the : - [Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，或类，而从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象的服务器类。The [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - [XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)时从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成类的工具。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) tool while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. - 类在创建时从作为 Web 服务通过标识的类的对象属性。The class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services via the attribute. 而不是使用直接类，而使用前面提到的工具或类。Instead of using the class directly, use the aforementioned tools or classes. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes. 具体取决于其作用域，实例用于维护任何以下列表中的项的名称：Depending on its scope, a instance can be used to maintain the names of any of the items in the following list: - 类型、 方法或字段。Types, methods, or fields. - 参数和返回值对应于 WSDL 方法的输入和输出消息。The parameters and return value of a method corresponding to WSDL input and output messages. - 对象内将序列化到 WSDL 文档的实例。Objects within a instance that can be serialized to a WSDL document. 通常情况下，类用于避免命名冲突之间在特定范围内，包括包含实体的名称冲突的代码实体。Typically, the class is used to avoid naming collisions between code entities within a particular scope, including collisions with the name of a containing entity.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and determines whether code identifiers are case sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Add (identifier As String, value As Object)
public: void Add(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: A name that is used to index the code entity.

span.span: A name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope.

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同方法，方法不会阻止命名冲突。Unlike the method, the method does not prevent naming collisions. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddReserved(string identifier) cil managed

param.name: identifier
param.span: A name that will not be available within the instance's scope.

span.span: A name that will not be available within the instance's scope.

summary.span: Prevents a specified name from being used within the instance's scope.

span.span: Prevents a specified name from being used within the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留的名称可以属于包含的代码实体，如为其也必须生成成员名称的类型。A reserved name can belong to a containing code entity, such as a type for which member names must also be generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AddUnique (string identifier, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance string AddUnique(string identifier, object value) cil managed
Public Function AddUnique (identifier As String, value As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ AddUnique(System::String ^ identifier, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: identifier
param.span: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.

span.span: A candidate name that is used to index the code entity.

param.name: value
param.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

span.span: The code entity or type mapping information.

summary.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.

span.span: Adds a named code entity or type mapping to the instance's scope, ensuring that the name is unique within the scope.

returns.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标识符参数值内不唯一生成实例的作用域，新的唯一字符串并将其在其位置中使用。If the identifier parameter value is not unique within the instance's scope, a new, unique string is generated and used in its place. 新字符串生成的将追加到输入的名称。The new string is generated by appending to the input name. 原始名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由以前调用生成方法。The original name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by a previous call to the method. 在每种情况下，如果新的标识符不是唯一的它第一次传递到方法来创建新的唯一标识符。In each case, if the new identifier is not unique, it is first passed to the method to create a new unique identifier. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the instance's scope.

span.span: Removes all code entities or type mappings, including their names, from the instance's scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留名称，如通过添加方法，不会删除。Reserved names, as added through the method, are not removed. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

span.span: Determines whether a specified name is already being used within the instance's scope.

returns.span: if the name is already in use; otherwise, .

span.span: if the name is already in use; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由生成方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MakeRightCase(string identifier) cil managed
Public Function MakeRightCase (identifier As String) As String

span.span: The name to possibly modify.

summary.span: Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the property.

span.span: Ensures that the input is of the correct case by modifying the name according to the value of the property.

returns.span: A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.

span.span: A string that is the same as the input identifier or has the first letter's case modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值属性是`true`和输入的第一个字符是一个字母，则它由大小写，如有必要。If the value of the property is `true` and the first character of the input is a letter, it is made lowercase, if necessary. 如果值是`false`、 Pascal 大小写是否生效，并且第一个字符，如果一个字母，大写，如有必要。If the value of the is `false`, Pascal case is in effect and the first character, if a letter, is capitalized, if necessary.

Public Function MakeUnique (identifier As String) As String

param.name: identifier
param.span: The name to modify if it is not already unique.

summary.span: Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.

span.span: Determines whether the input name conflicts with another name within the instance's scope and, if it does, generates a modified string.

returns.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

span.span: The identifier parameter value or a modified string if there is a name collision.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入的名称不是唯一如果以前曾传递给， ，或方法，或如果它由生成方法。The input name is not unique if it was passed previously to the , , or method, or if it was generated by the method. 如果名称不是唯一的则通过将追加到原始字符串生成新的字符串。If the name is not unique, a new string is generated by appending to the original string. 如果你想要控制代码实体绑定到 XML 架构或 Web 服务定义的名称，使用关联的属性而不创建的实例类。If you want to control the names of code entities that are bound to XML Schema or Web service definitions, use the associated attributes rather than creating an instance of the class. 完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCamelCasing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance uses camel case.

value.span: 若要指示该实例使用 camel 大小写;以指示该实例使用 Pascal 大小写。

span.span: to indicate that the instance uses camel case; to indicate that the instance uses Pascal case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 camel 大小写，如果标识符的第一个字符是一个字母，它必须为小写。With camel case, if the first character of an identifier is a letter, it must be lowercase. 使用 Pascal 大小写，如果第一个字符是一个字母，它必须是大写。With Pascal case, if the first character is a letter, it must be uppercase.
